sn11.17:1: Sāvatthiyaṁ jetavane. Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā divāvihāragato hoti paṭisallīno. Atha kho sakko ca devānamindo brahmā ca sahampati yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā paccekaṁ dvārabāhaṁ nissāya aṭṭhaṁsu. Atha kho sakko devānamindo bhagavato santike imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:
sn11.17:2: "Uṭṭhehi vīra vijitasaṅgāma,Pannabhāra anaṇa parajika loke;Cittañca te suvimuttaṁ,Cando yathā pannarasāya rattin"ti.
sn11.17:3: "Na kho, devānaminda, tathāgatā evaṁ vanditabbā. Evañca kho, devānaminda, tathāgatā vanditabbā:
sn11.17:4: ‘Uṭṭhehi vīra vijitasaṅgāma,Satthavāha anaṇa parajika loke;Desassu bhagavā dhammaṁ,Aññātāro bhavissantī’"ti.
